content: गुह्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be concealed, covered or kept secret, private; गुह्यं च गूहति <ls>Bh. 2. 72.</ls> {@--2@} Secret, solitary, retired. {@--3@} Mysterious; <ls>Bg. 18. 63.</ls> --ह्यः {@--1@} Hypocrisy. {@--2@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--3@} A tortoise. --ह्यं {@--1@} A secret, mystery; मौनं चैवास्मि गुह्यानां <ls>Bg. 10. 38</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">9. 2</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 117</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 45.</ls> {@--2@} A privity, the male or female organ of generation. {@--3@} The anus.
